message.content: {"id": "112458", "title": "Bug 112458: Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer.", "description": "Description: Property Editor still displays the properties of layout items when switching to the Master page viewer.", "OB": "Customers may be confused as they might mistake it for the Master Page Editor and end up setting properties without first clicking on the Master Page viewer.", "EB": "When switching to the Master Page, the Property Editor should update to display the Master Page properties.", "SR": "Switch to the Master Page and verify that the Property Editor reflects the properties of the Master Page instead of the layout items."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
